item.title: First black Republican congresswoman Mia Love dies at 49
item.description: Love made history when she was voted into the House of Representatives for Utah, but was diagnosed with brain cancer in 2022.

item.title: DNA testing site 23andMe files for bankruptcy protection
item.description: The company said that it will now attempt to sell itself under the supervision of a court.

item.title: Who could be Canada's next PM and how will they be chosen?
item.description: The country's new Prime Minister Mark Carney has called for a national election on 28 April.

item.title: NewJeans announce hiatus after setback in court battle
item.description: The K-pop group, which now call themselves NJZ, announce a pause after debuting a new song.

item.title: South Korea court reinstates PM as acting leader
item.description: The court has dismissed Han Duck-soo's impeachment, as South Korea's political turbulence continues.
